FragilityCurve.Description: Quantity is based upon 13'x100' Panels. Quantity of wall damaged varies by damage state.
FragilityCurve.Name: Wall Partition, Type: Gypsum with metal studs, Full Height, Fixed Below, Fixed Above
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes: None Import errors: Warning, Data missing: C1011.001a:DS3:Time: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: C1011.001a:DS3:Time: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C1011.001a:DS3:Time: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C1011.001a:DS3:Time: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5 Warning, Data missing: C1011.001a:DS3:Cost: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: C1011.001a:DS3:Cost: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C1011.001a:DS3:Cost: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C1011.001a:DS3:Cost: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5 Warning: C1011.001a: C1011.001a: DS1 overlaps DS2 at 0.084 - Make sure damage states are minimally overlapping

DamageState.Description: Screw pop-out, cracking of wall board, warping or cracking of tape, slight crushing of wall panel at corners.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Retape joints, paste and repaint. May require cutting and replacing corner sections of board. Repair 5% wallboard, 10% retape, 25% repaint.

DamageState.Description: Moderate cracking or crushing of gypsum wall boards (typically in corners). Moderate corner gap openings, bending of boundary studs.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Remove and replace 10% of wall board (both sides), retape and paste 25% of wall, paint 50% of wall. Replace boundary studs of approximately 5 intersections per 100 ft of wall length.

DamageState.Description: Buckling of studs and tearing of tracks. Tearing or bending of top track, tearing at corners with transverse walls, large gap openings, walls displaced.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Remove and replace 50% of length of metal stud wall, 50% of both sides of the gypsum, and any embedded utilities. Retape and paste as required. Repaint 100%.
